name: Monkey Mayhem (heckadactyl)
description:
This was made as part of Mini Jam 75: Wisdom, (72 hours).

Use WASD or arrow keys to move around, and see if you can get out of the anti-gravity chamber. 

Code, music, sfx, and monkey art by me. Tileset by KIIRA via OpenGameArt.

This is a very rough early version of the game, I bit off a bit more than I could chew (noob here). However I plan on finishing it up and polishing, adding more variation etc.  

Right now level 2 and 3 are basically the same -- it's not a glitch. It will be fixed! :) 

Thanks for playing!
